AbstractText.sentence: HIV-1 proviral DNA contains two binding sites for the transcription factor NF-kappa B.

AbstractText.sentence: The experiments in this report show that cysteine or N-acetylcysteine (NAC) raise the intracellular glutathione (GSH) level and inhibit HIV-1 replication in persistently infected Molt-4 and U937 cells.

AbstractText.sentence: This suggests that the cysteine deficiency in HIV-1-infected individuals may cause an over-expression of NF-kappa B-dependent genes and enhance HIV-1 replication.
